title: BMI Calculator
description: Enter your height and weight to instantly check your BMI and weight category.
helper: Provide height (cm) and weight (kg) to calculate BMI automatically.

result.title: Result
result.empty: Please enter your height and weight.

tips.title: Tips
tips.line1: Ranges are based on adult BMI categories.
tips.line2: Check additional metrics for a fuller picture.
tips.line3: BMI does not directly measure body fat.

openGraph.title: BMI Calculator
openGraph.description: Free BMI calculator to quickly determine your body mass index and weight category. Enter height and weight to get an instant result and start managing your health goals.
